title: Ground Zero: A Zombie Apocalypse
description: A STAND ALONE ZOMBIE NOVEL. “This is exactly the kind of intelligent, action-packed zombie thriller that fans of DJ Molles and Max Brooks will love!” - ZombiesBookBlog Aboard a freighter bound for Baltimore harbor, an Iranian terrorist prepares to unleash an unimaginable horror upon the United States. The 'Wrath' is an undead plague - an infection that consumes its victims with maddening rage, and turns them into mindless blood-thirsty killers. Jack Cutter is just an ordinary guy dealing with a dreadful guilt when the virus tears through his home town. Before it is too late, Cutter will have to find a way to survive, and find a reason to fight. A full length stand alone novel.
author: Nicholas Ryan
